column2: gg = ggplot(d2, aes(x=bmi,y = log,color=factor(smoker))) + geom_point() +facet_grid(~age_cat) + scale_color_manual(name="Smoking Habits",values=cb_palette)
gg + labs(title = "BMI vs Medical Charges",x="BMI",y="Medical Charges",subtitle="Colored by Smoking Habits") + geom_vline(xintercept=30,linetype="dashed")
